import React from'react';import classNames from"classnames/bind";import styles from"./friendList.module.scss";import{avatarIcon}from"../image";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const cx=classNames.bind(styles);function FriendList(_ref){let{onSelectFriend}=_ref;const friends=[{id:1,avatar:avatarIcon,name:"Cục Quản lý đề điều và PCTT"},{id:2,avatar:avatarIcon,name:"Minh Dương"},{id:3,avatar:avatarIcon,name:"Tuấn Huy"},{id:4,avatar:avatarIcon,name:"Giáp Vân Trang"},{id:5,avatar:avatarIcon,name:"IF KOHOC RETURN 0"},{id:6,avatar:avatarIcon,name:"SS-NHẬT"},{id:7,avatar:avatarIcon,name:"Huy Hoàn"},{id:8,avatar:avatarIcon,name:"Kiều Quân"},{id:9,avatar:avatarIcon,name:"Quốc Thiện"},{id:2,avatar:avatarIcon,name:"Minh Dương"},{id:3,avatar:avatarIcon,name:"Tuấn Huy"},{id:4,avatar:avatarIcon,name:"Giáp Vân Trang"},{id:5,avatar:avatarIcon,name:"IF KOHOC RETURN 0"},{id:6,avatar:avatarIcon,name:"SS-NHẬT"},{id:7,avatar:avatarIcon,name:"Huy Hoàn"},{id:8,avatar:avatarIcon,name:"Kiều Quân"},{id:9,avatar:avatarIcon,name:"Quốc Thiện"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:cx('friendList'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:cx('friend-container'),children:friends.map(friend=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:cx('friend-item'),onClick:()=>onSelectFriend(friend)// click chọn bạn
,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:cx('avatar-section'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:friend.avatar,alt:friend.name,className:cx('avatar')})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:cx('content'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:cx('name'),children:friend.name})})]},friend.id))})});}export default FriendList;
